snippet: Dr. Harold E. Varmus, a Nobel Prize winner, announced Wednesday that he would step down as head of the National Cancer Institute on March 31.
abstract: Dr Harold E Varmus, a Nobel Prize winner, announces he will step down as head of the National Cancer Institute.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Harold E. Varmus, a Nobel Prize winner, announced Wednesday that he would step down as head of the National Cancer Institute on March 31.

headline.main: Chief of National Cancer Institute Resigns
